attributes.action: security guards to be made mandatory for schools childrens protection
attributes.additional_details:
Following the recent shootings in schools in the USA and stabbings in China, I think it is time that we become more prepared for action on these sick crazes and protect our children in schools.

Before entering a school's premises, searches should take place to ensure that no one has any harmful weapons, suspicious behaviour can be dealt with before entry and any danger to the pupils can be dealt with before it gets to the point where its too late.

This may sound like a dramatic solution, but if something was to happen as bad as it was in Connecticut it could be prevented.
